starter_gifts.Description: Choose what starter gifts you'll receive as a new arrival!

daily_blessings.Description: If turned on, this option will allow the seasonal deity altar to give you a blessing each day when interacted with.

gift_level.Description: Affects starting gifts. If you choose Overpowered, you will receive a better starter gift to help you skip early game. Choose Regular for a normal run, or Challenge for a harder run.

misc_deco.Description: Enables or disables decorative elements such as the doghouse, fountain, etc.

gazebo.Description: Enables or disables the large gazebo in the south center area.

extra_foliage.Description: Enables or disables small decorative foliage in accessible areas of the farm.

big_foliage.Description: Enables or disables large foliage deco like fallen logs and decorative trees.

duck_pond.Description: Enables or disables the duck pond in the center of the map.
